entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F813,0,236001}{F87A,124}So even {F843,0} would make that{F801}choice...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236002}Cowardly human...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F813,0,236001}{F87A,124}So even {F843,0} would make that{F801}choice...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236002}Cowardly human...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236003}...You are too late to walk that path,{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236004}You have committed too deeply to{F801}upending the status quo...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236003}...You are too late to walk that path,{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236004}You have committed too deeply to{F801}upending the status quo...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0
entry.target: {F812}The White\0

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236005}Why do you oppose us, {F843,0}?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236005}Why do you oppose us, {F843,0}?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236006}Will even you place your hopes in{F801}the possibility of a future?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236007}Even after we have shown you many{F801}times there is no future for the{F801}human race?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236006}Will even you place your hopes in{F801}the possibility of a future?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236007}Even after we have shown you many{F801}times there is no future for the{F801}human race?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236008}You are no longer of use to us.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236009}May you regret your choice here in{F801}this fabricated space until you die...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,236008}You are no longer of use to us.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236009}May you regret your choice here in{F801}this fabricated space until you die...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,236011}Ah, so it is! I didn't think I'd be{F801}seeing you in this world.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,236011}Ah, so it is! I didn't think I'd be{F801}seeing you in this world.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,236014}But it appears the White plan to keep{F801}us locked up here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236015}Though I'm relieved to have you here{F801}with me, {F843,0}...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,236014}But it appears the White plan to keep{F801}us locked up here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,236015}Though I'm relieved to have you here{F801}with me, {F843,0}...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,237001}Looks like you didn't fall for the{F801}White's moaning and kept right on{F801}going your own way.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F813,0,237001}Looks like you didn't fall for the{F801}White's moaning and kept right on{F801}going your own way.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237002}Hi, you guys! Long time no see.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237002}Hi, you guys! Long time no see.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,237004}Hey, you don't think I'm one of the{F801}White too, do you?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237005}*giggle* No way. I'm definitely the{F801}real me!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,237004}Hey, you don't think I'm one of the{F801}White too, do you?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237005}*giggle* No way. I'm definitely the{F801}real me!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,237006}Although this is not precisely my{F801}true form...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,237006}Although this is not precisely my{F801}true form...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237008}Thanks to your work in opening the{F801}gate to the Expanse, I live again.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237008}Thanks to your work in opening the{F801}gate to the Expanse, I live again.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237010}Playing the fool to mask my subtle{F801}maneuverings is a sure strategy.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237010}Playing the fool to mask my subtle{F801}maneuverings is a sure strategy.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,237011}Hikaru... Er, no, "Lucifer", was it?{F801}Why are you here...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,237011}Hikaru... Er, no, "Lucifer", was it?{F801}Why are you here...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237012}I believe I mentioned before that I{F801}am interested in you all...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237012}I believe I mentioned before that I{F801}am interested in you all...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237013}We stand in the Expanse. It is a world{F801}fabricated by people's thoughts.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237014}The White are also aggregations of{F801}thoughts. They are part of this space.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237013}We stand in the Expanse. It is a world{F801}fabricated by people's thoughts.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237014}The White are also aggregations of{F801}thoughts. They are part of this space.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237015}Though you rejected their proposal,{F801}the White's influence is still strong.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237016}There are four of the White lurking{F801}somewhere within this forest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237017}Kill them all and break their influence{F801}on this place.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237018}If you can do this, I shall return you{F801}to your own world.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237015}Though you rejected their proposal,{F801}the White's influence is still strong.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237016}There are four of the White lurking{F801}somewhere within this forest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237017}Kill them all and break their influence{F801}on this place.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,237018}If you can do this, I shall return you{F801}to your own world.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237020}Let me heal your wounds.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,237020}Let me heal your wounds.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,0,237021}If you find yourself too wounded to{F801}continue, come to the forest entrance.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,0,237021}If you find yourself too wounded to{F801}continue, come to the forest entrance.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,0,237022}I'll provide healing whenever you{F801}need it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,0,237022}I'll provide healing whenever you{F801}need it.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Lucifer walked away...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Lucifer walked away...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,236016}I'll certainly not allow myself to{F801}die here. Let us go hence!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,236016}I'll certainly not allow myself to{F801}die here. Let us go hence!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter joined you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter joined you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,236012}The White kept nattering on about{F801}turning the world to naught, or{F801}some such...{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,5,1,1}{F813,0,236013}That's why I told them that I'll{F801}destroy the way of things now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,236012}The White kept nattering on about{F801}turning the world to naught, or{F801}some such...{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,5,1,1}{F813,0,236013}That's why I told them that I'll{F801}destroy the way of things now.{F801}
